thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Alice
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Alice

author: Alice
title: Alice
text: JR Pass was easy to purchase online in Australia and was delivered quickly via mail. JR staff at Kyoto station were very helpful and efficient; we used our passes many times over the 7-day period, both for inter-city travel and on the JR Yamamoto line within Tokyo. Very easy to reserve seats in advance and great value.
